name: Google+ font size and 'show more...'
description:
This userstyle
* Increases the default font size of Google+
* Shows all comments on posts by default
* Expands all posts and comments (no more 'show more...')
additional_info: Tested on Google Chrome Note: this style is meant to be used in combination with the 'single column' (the 'accessibility mode') layout. Otherwise the left and right column probably won't match.
